competencies.competency_description: Demonstrated through the Lego Data Visualisation project where the client used dplyr and ggplot2 packages to generate visualisations. Also, the client has taken a course on Data Visualisation at NUS.

Used Python for various projects and internships, including the Stock Price Prediction project and the internship at Johnson & Johnson. Also, the client is proficient in various Python libraries such as NumPy, pandas, Matplotlib, seaborn, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and OpenCV.
Used R for the Lego Data Visualisation project and is proficient in R libraries such as tidyverse, dplyr, and ggplot2.
The client has listed SQL as a technical skill.
The client has listed Java as a technical skill.
Used Microsoft Excel for data validation and cleaning processes during the internship at Johnson & Johnson, and for preparing and filing tax returns during the internship at KPMG.

Managed end-to-end financial forecasting for the Long Range Financial Plan (LRFP) spanning from 2024 to 2028, managing sales figures totalling more than $4 billion during the internship at Johnson & Johnson.
Communicated effectively with clients and team members to identify and obtain necessary financial records in compliance with IRAS regulations during the internship at KPMG.
Utilised design thinking methodologies to develop a 90-second brand launch video for an in-house data analytics platform during the internship at Johnson & Johnson.
